metadata.Title: CVE-2017-8810 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - low.
metadata.Description:
MediaWiki before 1.27.4, 1.28.x before 1.28.3, and 1.29.x before 1.29.2, when a private wiki is configured, provides different error messages for failed login attempts depending on whether the username exists, which allows remote attackers to enumerate account names and conduct brute-force attacks via a series of requests.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-8810` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

mediawiki - 1.27.4-1
mediawiki-classes - 1.27.4-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: mediawiki package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.27.4-1').
